comment: ALERT : " I received an email from the US Forestry Service confirming that the Australian Govt has NOT asked to use their firefighting planes . They have C - Hercules firefighting planes that are kept on hour standby in the USA . Happy to share the email with you . "
amr:
# ::snt ALERT : " I received an email from the US Forestry Service confirming that the Australian Govt has NOT asked to use their firefighting planes . They have C - Hercules firefighting planes that are kept on hour standby in the USA . Happy to share the email with you . "
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / alert-01
            :ARG2 (r / receive-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (e / email-01
                        :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "US"
                                    :op2 "Forestry"
                                    :op3 "Service"))
                        :ARG0-of (c / confirm-01
                              :ARG1 (a2 / ask-02
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                                          :ARG0-of (g3 / govern-01
                                                :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                                      :name (n2 / name
                                                            :op1 "Australia"))))
                                    :ARG1 (u / use-01
                                          :ARG0 g2
                                          :ARG1 (p / plane
                                                :poss g2
                                                :ARG0-of (f / fight-01
                                                      :ARG1 (f2 / fire)))))))))
      :snt2 (h / have-03
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (p2 / plane
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "C-Hercules")
                  :ARG0-of (f3 / fight-01
                        :ARG1 (f4 / fire))
                  :ARG1-of (k / keep-01
                        :ARG3 (s / standby
                              :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (h2 / hour)))
                        :location (c3 / country
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "USA")))))
      :snt3 (h3 / happy-01
            :ARG0 (s2 / share-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 e)
            :ARG2 (y / you))
      :ARG1 ii)

comment: While on this topic , did anyone know that New Zealand PM Jacinda Ardern has sent firefighters , ( now ) back and forth since October ? I only learned this today . Why has this not been in media ? ABC ? anywhere ?
amr:
